entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:12 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:12 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
